results.content: Very comprehensive and well organized course

Tommy, while a bit dry, explained things in simplicity. I quickly pick up what is taught and I see web development as an actual puzzle. I can't wait to make the game at the end! If you're new to web development I would definitely take his course, I'm glad I did. -EDIT- So, I finished the course. The course was well put together. The JavaScript section was a little short, but the point of it was to help me understand how things worked in JavaScript (rather than cover all the syntax) which I can tell you has been a little confusing for me. I can wait to see the Ruby course that I keep hearing about so much, if the course is as easy to follow along as this course I might just switch careers entirely.
